text: This is a list of prime ministers of the Czech Republic, a political office that was created in 1993 following the dissolution of Czechoslovakia. ==List== ; Parties Portrait Name Term of office Term of office Term of office Political party Cabinet Cabinet Chamber of Deputies Portrait Name Took office Left office Days Political party Cabinet Cabinet Chamber of Deputies 1 Petr Pithart (1941-) 1990 1992 unknown unknown unknown unknown 1 Václav Klaus 2 July 1992 4 July 1996 Civic Democratic Party (ODS) I ODS – KDU-ČSL – ODA – KDS 1 Václav Klaus 4 July 1996 2 January 1998 Civic Democratic Party (ODS) II ODS – KDU-ČSL – ODA 2 Josef Tošovský 17 December 1997 22 July 1998 Independent • ODS – KDU-ČSL – ODA 3 Miloš Zeman 17 July 1998 15 July 2002 Czech Social Democratic Party (ČSSD) • ČSSD 4 Vladimír Špidla 15 July 2002 4 August 2004 Czech Social Democratic Party (ČSSD) • ČSSD – KDU-ČSL – US–DEU 5 Stanislav Gross 4 August 2004 25 April 2005 Czech Social Democratic Party (ČSSD) • ČSSD – KDU-ČSL – US–DEU 6 Jiří Paroubek 25 April 2005 4 September 2006 Czech Social Democratic Party (ČSSD) • ČSSD – KDU-ČSL – US–DEU 7 Mirek Topolánek 4 September 2006 9 January 2007 Civic Democratic Party (ODS) I ODS 7 Mirek Topolánek 8 November 2006 8 May 2009 Civic Democratic Party (ODS) II ODS – KDU-ČSL – SZ 8 Jan Fischer 9 April 2009 13 July 2010 Independent • No party 9 Petr Nečas 28 June 2010 10 July 2013 Civic Democratic Party (ODS) • ODS – TOP 09 – VV 10 Jiří Rusnok 25 June 2013 29 January 2014 Independent • ČSSD – KDU-ČSL 11 Bohuslav Sobotka 17 January 2014 13 December 2017 Czech Social Democratic Party (ČSSD) • ČSSD – ANO 2011 – KDU-ČSL 12 Andrej Babiš 6 December 2017 27 June 2018 ANO 2011 I ANO 2011 12 Andrej Babiš 27 June 2018 28 November 2021 ANO 2011 II ANO 2011 – ČSSD 13 Petr Fiala 28 November 2021 Incumbent Civic Democratic Party (ODS) I ODS – KDU-ČSL – ODA – KDS 13 Petr Fiala Civic Democratic Party (ODS) ==References== * PM Czech
title: List of prime ministers of the Czech Republic
